settings.heading: Customer Reviews
settings.subheading: See what our customers have been saying! We strive to provide our community with prompt, professional service and top quality products.
settings.righttext:
We appreciate our customers’ feedbacks!
Here’s what some of our customers say about our work.

settings.title: Google maps
What is Shopify?
settings.answer: Shopify is the world’s most powerful e-commerce platform that allows anyone to easily sell online, at a retail location, and everywhere in between.

settings.title: How do I setup my store?
settings.answer:
When you buy this theme you get full access to our comprehensive and easy to follow instructions on setting up the theme for your store.
If you’re looking for more generic Shopify store setup instructions, there are plenty of resources available on Shopify’s own website.

settings.title: Do I need a Designer/Programmer for my store?
settings.answer: We’ve designed the theme to be as flexible and configurable as possible but also made it simple to use. You would only need a designer/developer if you wanted to custom code something that the theme doesn’t do natively.

settings.title: When you purchase a theme is that a one-time fee?
settings.answer: Yes, unlike other themes, you get free upgrades and support for 6-months and you only pay a one-time fee, unless stated otherwise.

settings.title: Can I use the theme for multiple shops?
settings.answer: All of our themes are subject to a one-store license, so if you want to utilize the same theme in several live stores, you’ll have to purchase multiple licenses.

settings.title: Does this theme work with all Shopify plans?
settings.answer: Yes, it works with all plans.

settings.title: Is it necessary to pay for the service to setup the store?
settings.answer: No, we’ve designed the theme to be as intuitive to use as possible and we have also provided step-by-step instructions inside our theme description.

settings.title: What is the scope of your support?
settings.answer: Our support includes general inquiries regarding theme functionality; help with customizing the theme settings and any observed defect or theme issues. It doesn’t cover issues, such as errors due to third- party plugins or as an after effect of changes made to the theme code. For the full details on the extent of our support, please visit our Support Policy page.

settings.title: What if I need help with Shopify issues?
settings.answer: General shop inquiries, such as uploading products, creating collections, adding discount codes, managing domains, etc. can be best addressed by reaching Shopify Support specifically and/or by checking on their broad documentation accessible in the Shopify Manual.

settings.title: How fast do you respond to support inquiries?
settings.answer: We aim to give feedback to all requests within 24 hours, but please allow 1-2 business days for the response. Our support team is primarily based in the UTC +7 and is available during standard business hours. We have a weekend staff to answer basic queries too.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subheading:
Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions,
please just write on right section and send to us.

settings.intro_des:
The 2020 story started over a coffee at one of our favourite cafes – Nooks in Randwick, Sydney in early 2013. Sitting there looking at all the mums, bubs, Shopify theme and prams we started thinking… Shopify theme and prams all look the same… black, maybe a little red here and there, very few had any colour or excitement. We thought – what alternatives are there for Australian mums and dads that a stroller that is functional, modern and at an affordable price? Most stroller brands come from the US or Europe but what about a local Australian brand?

We searched far and wide and everywhere in between and couldn’t find any options that were functional, modern, Australian owned and at an affordable price. Surprisingly, we couldn’t even find any Shopify theme or prams that were designed to comply with the latest Australian safety standards.
settings.chooseus_des:
2020 has always been a design company at heart. The Innovation Department, responsible for the development of new concepts and products and counting more than 70 employees to date, is the beating heart and the engine of the company.
The original Shopify theme, the 2020, breathes the legacy of 15 years of the design. Having evolved over time, the iconic all-in-one Shopify theme remains unsurpassed with regards to its defining functionalities.

Now all of our Shopify theme, including the 2020, share the same design principles: design and engineering, aesthetics and functionality, form and function, have come together seamlessly.
settings.chooseus_answer1: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.chooseus_answer2: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.chooseus_answer3: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.chooseus_answer4: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.team_des_1: Emma earned her BSS in Psychology and BSC in Management from Santa Clara University. She joined Us after 4+ years in venture.
settings.team_des_2: John is a proud graduate of Teachers College’s Instructional Design and Technology program and can usually be found gaming, reading
settings.team_des_3: Sarah earned her BSS in Psychology and BSC in Management from Santa Clara University. She joined Us after 4+ years in venture.
settings.team_des_4: William loves tackling the legal issues that arise as transforms education. He used to have hobbies like traveling. He joined Us after 4+ years in venture.
settings.action_des: Enjoy the feeling of freedom, that’s the feeling we want to capture when we design our products.

settings.code:
Hire & Repairs

We are a qualified repair & service agent for Cigweld gas repairs so we can repair – blowpipes, cutting attachments, regulators, mig guns, tig torches & heavy duty cutting torches. We can also test your flashback arrestors.

We also repair mig welders, tig welders, caddy welders, rotators, straight line cutters & pipe cutters. Tecweld has a large hire fleet for short or long term hire, call 9277 1444 to discuss your requirements.

settings.title: Sign up to our Newsletter and get the discount code!

settings.contenthtml:
Established in Perth in 1981, Tecweld Services has continued to grow to become one of Western Australia’s premier welding supply companies. With access to all the major brands, Tecweld is focused on selling quality products at competitive prices with timely delivery. We have a fantastic range of products in our Belmont warehouse as well as a fleet of hire machines available.

We supply many industries around W.A. including fabrication, mining, agriculture, construction, education and marine. We ask the right questions so you get the correct product the first time. With our main focus on welding equipment and welding consumables we have gradually expanded into the safety and abrasives market due to customer demand for us to be more of a one-stop shop.

Proudly family owned and operated by Harvey and Claire Mayall, we are committed to customer satisfaction.

We also repair mig welders, tig welders, caddy welders, rotators, straight line cutters & pipe cutters.

We are currently working on listing and showcasing all products but for now, please use the drop down menus to check out the range or products and services we provide.
